mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2, MEMBER_AUTH, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SYSDATE ) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(a.member_no),0)+1 from member a), #{member_name}, #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_email}, #{member_addr1}, #{member_addr2}, #{member_auth}, #{member_phone}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE member_approve='N' and member_auth in('staff','leader') and member_sysdate < TO_CHAR(sysdate - 3, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
